channel.title: VPS Botting
channel.description:
Sorry if this is the wrong section:P
I've been thinking about getting a vps for running my bots, probably just ONE bot at a time, maybe two.
I can't decide between BotVPS or PhotonVps.
Soo i'm asking for some feedback on which works better, i've heard BotVps is good but too slow, and i've heard that Photon is better, it goes back and forth, i'm not sure which is better.
Thanks

item.title: VPS Botting
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I use vpsland. Its pretty good to use

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Botting
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:7, topic:380683”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=476507.msg3484679#msg3484679 date=1296444450]
Dont understand how the botvps would be too slow when its running on 100mbps?
[/quote]

The problem isn’t the VPS being slow. It’s that trying to play RS on a remote computer with a slow internet connection (your own) is next to impossible.[/quote]

Well shit lol, i have good net, but its terrible on rs, satellite net + rs = 2-3 second delay

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Botting
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Dont understand how the botvps would be too slow when its running on 100mbps?

The problem isn’t the VPS being slow. It’s that trying to play RS on a remote computer with a slow internet connection (your own) is next to impossible.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Botting
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:5, topic:380683”]Dont understand how the botvps would be too slow when its running on 100mbps?
Make sure your running great scripts. Id go with botvps for easy setup.[/quote]

True, I might try it, waiting on paypal to confirm then i’ll probably get it.

Newty:

I’d never heard of these before. I bot with a vpsland vps. I run 3 bots on it normally.

Never heard of vpsland, i’ll check it out :)… The reason botvps looks nice, its already packed and shit just for runescape botting, has the client and what not linked to it, or so it seems.

Read full topic

Dont understand how the botvps would be too slow when its running on 100mbps?

item.title: VPS Botting
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Noob BotVPS Guaranteed 512MB RAM (Extra 50% RAM Burstable) High-speed Internet Connection (All VPS's are on 100mbps/1000mbps nodes) Pre-installed with latest Java Version Pre-installed with Botclient Instant VPS Setup

^BotVps $8/Month

Photon 10.95/Month

20GB Disk Sace Traffic 500GP 512GB Memory
Pretty much all it says on Photon.

Read full topic
